USE

This is a rentals management app. It help you manage rental records like tenancy agreements(start dates,end dates, rental fees,tenant,room/apartment), rent payments and invoices. All your information will be avaiable at you finger tips;who has not paid,which tenancy is soon expiring,how much money has room A generated this year, what is my annual gross earnings for rentals in location A etc. You will receive notifications for over due rent, easily email receipts and invoices, and send sms reminders. You can export data(invoices and receipts) as CSV files which you can view in excel. It also keep track of post-paid electricity meter readings.

Set Up.

The App capture data on the following:

(1):Tenants perticulars captured :First Name, SurName, Mobile Numbers,email..etc.
(2):Meters perticulars captured are : Serial Number, Meter Number.
(3):Periodic Meter Readings for each meter.
(4):Power Payments Payments for the computed electricity bill.
(5):Locations Places where you own rentals
(6):Apartment Blocks Buildings that houses the various apartments/rooms.
(7):Apartments This what you actually rent out.
(8):Tenancy Agreements This is generally a specified amount of rent for a given room for a period of time for a given tenant.
(9): Periodic Invoicing You create invoices for tenants e.g monthly.
(10): Receipts You create receipts after an invoice is paid by the tenant.
Steps(not in linear order. Skip steps 1,3,4 if you are not to use the app to manage meter readings ):
1: Add Meters
2: Add Tenants
3:Allocate meters to Tenants
4:Enter meter readings e.g after a month
5:Enter payments for power/electricity when made by tenants
6:Add Rentals Information:location,blocks and apartments/rooms
7:Enter Tenancy information:room,startdate,EndDate, Rental Amount
8:Enter periodic invoices e.g monthly
9:Enter receipts against invoices as the Tenants pay

How to add Meters(tap blue links for images ).

While at the home page Main Menu ,tap the device Menu to show the different menu options.
Choose the Add Meter option and the screen for capturing the meter information opens.
Enter the Meter serial number(as indicated on the meter) and give the meter a number e.g 001.
Add Meters

How to add Tenants.

While at the home screen,tap the device Menu to show the different menu options.
Choose the Add Tenants option and the screen for capturing the information opens.
Enter the tenant perticulars e.g first name, mobile numbers, email.
Add Tenants To show list of Tenants click on Tenants menu item from the main menu. Tenants

Allocate Meters .

While at the home screen,tap the device Menu to show the different menu options.
Choose the Meters option and the list of meters will be displayed. Meters
Tap/press the screen for a few seconds and a sub menu will appear. Choose Allocate Meters . Select a tenant and a meter number you are allocating to that tenant. Enter other details as shown on the screen .
The submenu displayed also has the screen for entering meter reading(Read Meters).
To record a payment for power/electricity,select process power payment from the app main menu.
Meter Allocation

Add Tenancy Information.

While at the home screen, tap the device Menu to show the different menu options.
Choose the Tenancy Mgt. For first time use, you get a blank screen. Subsquently, a list of active tenancy will be shown. Tenancy List Press the menu button to bring the Tenancy Mgt Menu.
Tenancy Mgt Menu Follw the steps below(in the order given!).
(1) Add Location( just one entry if u have apartments in one area only)
(2) Add Apartment Blocks(also one entry if you have a single block ) just name it something like "Main Block".
(3) Add apartments/rooms now.( A room belongs to a block and a block belongs to a location)
(4) Add Tenancy (for each room/apartment.) Tenant A for Room 1(an example) ,Tenant B for room 2 etc....should be for a specif period. e.g a year...etc.
(5) Start invoicing Tenants(Process Invoices) e.g monthly(enter start date and end date, date and the amount).
(6) Receive Payments(Rental Receipts) when the tenant pays(an invoice must exist before you receive the payment).
(7) Other functionality can be discovered by long tapping(pressing) the screen or selecting the menu item
(8) Always backup the application data(main menu, select backup) and keep the database file on a seperate storage medium like a pc,laptop,etc. The file is stored(after backing up) in the folder MeterAppBackups created either on the Sd card or device internal storage.
Edit Meter allocation perticulars like Tenant, Meter Number, Allocation and Meter Reading.
Enter name or transaction type you want to search
